title: These PC Cases Do Airflow RIGHT!
description: The new Silverstone cases have a primary focus on airflow above all else with their Alta and Raven prototype cases.  Its great to see that trying to create the best case for airflow   Subscribe    As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second Camera -  $700 Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #silverstone #silverstonealta #computex2019 #harwarecanucks
